name: HIGH HOPES
description:
my final product with the theme of "sky"  for my GAME206 class.

PRESS DOWN TO START THE GAME

highly recommended to play while listening Pink Floyd-High Hopes

how to play:
use arrow keys to move around, try to communicate with everyting you see to get the whole story.

our main character is a girl who seeks love. . and this is the story of her which has started with a small chat with the bartender..

click here for the game trailer

last but not least, special thanks to my friend berkay for his support  throughout  this journey

 ♥
